code: import $ from"jquery";$(function(){$(".main-menu nav > span").click(function(){$(".main-menu nav > ul").slideToggle();});});$(window).bind("resize",checkPosition);function checkPosition(){if(window.matchMedia("(max-width: 991px)").matches){$(".main-menu nav > ul").css("display","none");}else{$(".main-menu nav > ul").css("display","block");}}function checkMenu(){var windowSize=$(window).width();if(windowSize<=991){$(".caret-icon").remove();$(".main-menu nav > ul > li").each(function(){if($(this).find("ul").length>0){$(this).append("");}});$(".main-menu nav > ul > li > .caret-icon").click(function(){$(this).parent().find("ul").slideToggle();});}else{$(".main-menu nav > ul > li").hover(function(){$(this).find("ul").fadeIn("fast");},function(){$(this).find("ul").fadeOut("fast");});}}checkMenu();$(window).resize(function(event){event.preventDefault();checkMenu();});
